name: coffee
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.
instructions: Brew a shot of espresso using an espresso machine.
Pour the espresso into a coffee cup.
Steam the milk until it is hot and has a light layer of foam on top.
Slowly pour the steamed milk over the espresso, holding back the foam with a spoon.
Gently spoon the milk foam on top of the latte.
